医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
巨噬细胞可能在心房颤动的发展中发挥重要作用心房颤动 (AFib) 是一种常见的心脏病，其特征是快速且不规则的心跳，可导致中风和心力衰竭，目前的治疗方法具有多种副作用，并且无法有效预防 AFib 复发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Macrophages-may-play-a-major-role-in-the-development-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Macrophages-may-play-a-major-role-in-the-development-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67a46ac2-1bd2-4a1e-9702-5a5a5ba6f21e Thu, 13 Jul 2023 20:46:15 -0400 Macrophages may play a major role in the development of atrial fibrillation
概要报告提高了晚期卵巢癌治疗前 CT 报告的完整性根据《美国伦琴学杂志》(AJR) 上发表的一篇已接受的手稿，一份概要报告提高了晚期卵巢癌患者治疗前 CT 报告的完整性，包括已确定的不可切除或难以切除的疾病部位。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Synoptic-reports-improve-completeness-of-pretreatment-CT-reports-in-advanced-ovarian-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Synoptic-reports-improve-completeness-of-pretreatment-CT-reports-in-advanced-ovarian-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc2b044c-d90c-449a-af32-dbe5f77e7d96 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 20:32:09 -0400 Synoptic reports improve completeness of pretreatment CT reports in advanced ovarian cancer
药剂师主导的干预有助于抑制多重耐药病原体阻止医院超级细菌增加的斗争一直是医疗保健专业人员持续不断的斗争。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Pharmacist-led-intervention-can-help-suppress-multi-drug-pressive-pathogens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Pharmacist-led-intervention-can-help-suppress-multi-drug-pressive-pathogens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e9c1ba3-f46d-4261-83c7-3b93ff73ba8b Thu, 13 Jul 2023 20:25:17 -0400 Pharmacist-led intervention can help suppress multi-drug resistant pathogens
长期暴露于臭氧会增加死亡风险在《环境科学与生态技术》杂志第 15 卷上发表的一项新研究中，武汉科技大学的研究人员发现，即使 O3 浓度小幅增加 10 μg m−3，所有污染物的风险比也为 1.18。导致死亡，表明死亡风险增加 18%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Long-term-ozone-exposure- Associated-with-increased-mortality-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Long-term-ozone-exposure-linked-with-increased-mortality-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5eb28b9e-24ed-4764-85df-fc7527bde21a Thu, 13 Jul 2023 20:17:35 -0400 Long-term ozone exposure associated with increased mortality risk
联合疗法显示出治疗晚期 ER+ 乳腺癌的希望晚期雌激素受体阳性（ER+）乳腺癌尤其难以治疗。由 Todd W. Miller 博士领导的达特茅斯癌症中心研究人员进行的一项新研究表明，联合使用雌激素和 PARP 抑制剂（一种抑制 DNA 损伤修复的药物）来治疗此类癌症有希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Combination-therapy-shows-promise-in-treating-advanced-ER2b-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Combination-therapy-shows-promise-in-treating-advanced-ER2b-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72ebd69a-3b1a-4db9-8ad0-da826eafbf17 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 20:07:29 -0400 Combination therapy shows promise in treating advanced ER+ breast cancer
新的生物标志物可以追踪阿尔茨海默病的进展有两种病理学驱动阿尔茨海默病的进展。早期，β-淀粉样蛋白斑块起主导作用，但当认知症状出现时，随着驱动力和认知能力的稳步下降，tau蛋白缠结就会取而代之。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/New-biomarker-could-track-progression-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/New-biomarker-could-track-progression-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=136eb52f-f493-4f47-a412-4ec4dce4daeb Thu, 13 Jul 2023 20:02:05 -0400 New biomarker could track progression of Alzheimer's disease
科学家发现艾滋病毒感染者的细胞死亡机制Simona Stäger教授团队在人类免疫缺陷病毒（HIV）研究方面取得突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Scientists-discover-mechanism-of-cell-death-in-people-living-with-HIV.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Scientists-discover-mechanism-of-cell-death-in-people-living-with-HIV.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0673962-9dc5-4811-a241-93719c0196a5 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 19:57:23 -0400 Scientists discover mechanism of cell death in people living with HIV
优质睡眠有助于增强对心理健康障碍的抵抗力研究表明，优质睡眠有助于增强抵抗抑郁和焦虑的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Quality-sleep-can-help-bolster-resilience-to-mental-health-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Quality-sleep-can-help-bolster-resilience-to-mental-health-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47cc43b2-b6d2-4263-bb4d-dbd7fc76a615 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 19:51:04 -0400 Quality sleep can help bolster resilience to mental health disorders
冷冻电镜揭示了参与蛋白质生产的关键酶的结构转移 RNA (tRNA) 是细胞中最常见的 RNA 类型之一，对于所有已知生物体的蛋白质生产都是不可或缺的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Cryo-EM-reveals-struct-of-key-enzyme-involved-in- Protein-Production.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/Cryo-EM-reveals-struct-of-key-enzyme-involved-in- Protein-Production.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=263dc403-6d99-404a-a8be-a3665455fa76 Thu, 13 Jul 2023 19:47:11 -0400 Cryo-EM reveals structure of key enzyme involved in protein production
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：控制短期计划的漫长道路历时两年多，拜登政府终于兑现了当时候选人乔·拜登的承诺，收回了特朗普政府扩大短期、限期医疗计划的做法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-The-long-road-to-reining-in-short-term-plans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230713/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-The-long-road-to-reining-in-short-term-plans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02dc8645-f034-4b5b-8890-cb0b244853cd Thu, 13 Jul 2023 19:17:49 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': The long road to reining in short-term plans
